params.description: If the login is with FB

classitems.description: Get chatroom's messages of an Exchange
classitems.name: GET api/chatroom/exchange

classitems.description: Post a chatroom's message of an Exchange
classitems.name: POST api/chatroom/exchange

return.description: Comments including `goods`, and they are not deleted

classitems.description: Post a comment to a goods
classitems.name: POST api/comment/post

params.name: content
params.description: The NEW content of the comment

classitems.description: Get all exchanges of a user
classitems.name: GET api/exchange/of/user/all

classitems.description: Get an exchanges of a user
classitems.name: GET api/exchange/of/user/one

return.description: An exchange object including goods( owner_goods, other_goods )

classitems.description: Get an exchange simply by given eid
classitems.name: GET api/exchange/

return.description: An exchange incluing goods and owners

params.name: goods_one_gid
params.description: One of goods in new exchange

return.description: If (goods_one, goods_two) pair exists return that one, or return new created exchange

classitems.description:
Accept an exchange by a user
And if two owners accept, then the exchange will be set status='completed'
When completed, other exchanges include goods_one or goods_two will be set to status='dropped'
And the goods that not goods_one or goods_two in the exchange will be set to exchanged=0
classitems.name: PUT api/exchange/agree

params.name: owner_uid
params.description: Who wants to accept this exchange

classitems.description:
Get who follow the given followed_uid
(follower -[follow]-> followed)
classitems.name: GET api/follow/followers/of

classitems.description:
Get who are followed by the given follower_uid
(follower -[follow]-> followed)
classitems.name: GET api/follow/followed/by

return.description: New created follow object, or if there is already one, return that one

classitems.description: Get a goods by given gid
classitems.name: GET api/goods/

return.description: A goods including users, comments and stars

classitems.description: Get all goods of given owner_uid
classitems.name: GET api/goods/of

return.description: The goods including comments and stars

classitems.description:
Delete a goods (but not really)
or if the goods is still in an exchange, this req will be ignored
classitems.name: Delete api/goods/delete

return.description: The goods including users and stars

classitems.description: Get messages by given receiver_uid and sender_uid
classitems.name: GET api/message

params.name: sender_uid
params.description: It can be not provided, will ignore sender

classitems.description: Post messages by given receiver and sender
classitems.name: POST api/message/post

classitems.description: Get notifications belong to a user
classitems.name: GET api/notification/belongsTo

return.description: The notifications including receiver and sender
A notification including receiver and sender
A notification including receiver and sender

classitems.description:
Get goods are queueing on given host_goods
(If queuer_goods is in another exchange, it will not be returned)
classitems.name: GET api/queue/of/goods

return.description: The queues including goods and owners (ASC)

classitems.description: Get goods are queued by given queuer_goods
classitems.name: GET api/queue/by/goods

return.description: The queues including goods and owners (DESC)

classitems.description: Get goods are queueing on someone's goods
classitems.name: GET api/queue/of/person

return.description: The queues including goods and owners

classitems.description: Get goods are queued by someone's goods
classitems.name: GET api/queue/by/person

return.description: The queues including goods and owners

classitems.description:
Post a queue
(queuer_goods -[queue]-> host_goods)
(If queuer_goods is in another exchange return {})
classitems.name: POST api/queue/post

return.description: New created queue object, already created one or {}

classitems.description: Get users who star the goods
classitems.name: GET api/star/to

params.name: goods_gid
params.description: The goods starred by a user

classitems.description: Get goods that a user stars
classitems.name: GET api/star/by

params.name: goods_gid
params.description: The goods starred by the user

return.description: New created star object or already created one

params.name: goods_gid
params.description: The goods starred by the user

classitems.description: Get a user by given uid or identity
classitems.name: GET api/user

classitems.description: Edit a user's profile, need token
classitems.name: PUT api/user/edit

return.description: Updated user object, or if not found, return null

classitems.description:
Update a user's photo_path
If same as the one in DB, nothing changed
classitems.name: PUT api/user/photo
